template.name: Human_Applicant
template.parameter: int id, double _v, int p_f, int p_fw, int p_dext, int path

location.name: h_executing
location.label: t' == 1 && tExp'==0 && tWH' == p_dext && tWH <= tWHTh && F <= F_max && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: h_busy
location.label: t' == 1 && tWH' == 0 && F <= F_max && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

transition.label: tWH >= tWHTh
served[currH-1]= true, t = 0, exeMission = 0, Fp=F, tUpd=0, tWH=0,hExe=0
